lead_paragraph: They brought in Chinese workers on diplomatic visas, ostensibly to work on Chinese government buildings, then forced them to work on private homes, federal prosecutors in Brooklyn said.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Chinese Diplomats Ran Illicit Work Ring, U.S. Says
headline.main: 2 Ex-Chinese Diplomats Charged With Running Forced-Labor Ring

snippet: They brought in Chinese workers on diplomatic visas, ostensibly to work on Chinese government buildings, then forced them to work on private homes, federal prosecutors in Brooklyn said....
abstract: Indictment by federal prosecutors in Brooklyn accuses two former Chinese diplomats of forcing workers brought over from China on so-called A2 or G2 visas to work on private construction projects, claiming workers were threatened with loss of their homes if they refused.
